input.description:
String Value - The name of a configuration item defined in a configuration module.
Example: BMC_AR_System, BMC_Remedyforce, ServiceNow

String Value - This contains the name or the id of the field you wish to search against.
If configuration name is ServiceNow, valid values are: applied ci-name task-id sys-created-by sys-created-on sys-id sys-mod-count sys-updated-by sys-updated-on
String Value - This contains the value you are looking for in the key 1 field.

String Value - Optional second key name or id
If configuration name is ServiceNow, valid values are: applied ci-name task-id sys-created-by sys-created-on sys-id sys-mod-count sys-updated-by sys-updated-on

String Value - A query based upon the values and keys in the above fields.
Note: ServiceNow does not support for input values for query.

output.description: An XML document providing the data template for single or multiple Concept elements.The task concept is an XML document containing specific elements used to assign multiple values to a single context item. Each value is associated with an element of the Concept.
Indicates whether or not the process completed successfully. Valid values: success, failure.
A process specific string that explains the value of success status.

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <fields> <xsl:apply-templates /> </fields> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="mappings/*"> <xsl:if test="string(@queryable) = '' or @queryable='true' "> <field> <xsl:value-of select="." /> </field> </xsl:if> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="query" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <items> <item> <schema>${schema name}</schema> <key>${key 1}</key> <value>${value 1}</value> <key2>${key 2}</key2> <value2>${value 2}</value2> <query> <xsl:value-of select="." /> </query> ${fields} </item> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

xpath-expression.xpath: concat("The retrieval of Relationship data failed for ", .)

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet:
<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="value" />
<xsl:template match="/"> <entries> <xsl:apply-templates/> </entries> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template match="entry"> <xsl:copy-of select="."/> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template match="metadata" />
</xsl:stylesheet>

xpath-expression.xpath: concat("The retrieval of Relationship data was completed successfully for ", .)

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <objects> <queryString> <xsl:if test="string-length('${key 1}')>0 and string-length('${value 1}')>0 and string-length('${key 2}') = 0"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Select Name, BMCServiceDesk__ClassName__c, BMCServiceDesk__CIInstance__c, BMCServiceDesk__InstanceID__c, BMCServiceDesk__ObjectName__c, BMCServiceDesk__ObjectRecordID__c, BMCServiceDesk__FKTask__c From BMCServiceDesk__BMC_CommonCILink__c where BMCServiceDesk__ObjectName__c = 'Task__c' and ${key 1} = '${value 1}'</xsl:text> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length('${key 2}')>0 and string-length('${value 2}')>0 and string-length('${key 1}') >0"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Select Name, BMCServiceDesk__ClassName__c, BMCServiceDesk__CIInstance__c, BMCServiceDesk__InstanceID__c, BMCServiceDesk__ObjectName__c, BMCServiceDesk__ObjectRecordID__c, BMCServiceDesk__FKTask__c From BMCServiceDesk__BMC_CommonCILink__c where BMCServiceDesk__ObjectName__c = 'Task__c' and ${key 1} = '${value 1}' and ${key 2} = '${value 2}'</xsl:text> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length('${key 2}')=0 and string-length('${key 1}')= 0"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Select Name, BMCServiceDesk__ClassName__c, BMCServiceDesk__CIInstance__c, BMCServiceDesk__InstanceID__c, BMCServiceDesk__ObjectName__c, BMCServiceDesk__ObjectRecordID__c, BMCServiceDesk__FKTask__c From BMCServiceDesk__BMC_CommonCILink__c where BMCServiceDesk__ObjectName__c = 'Task__c'</xsl:text> </xsl:if> </queryString> </objects> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

xpath-expression.xpath: concat("The retrieval of Relationship data failed for ", .)
concat("The retrieval of Relationship data was completed successfully for ", .)
concat("The retrieval of Relationship data failed for ", .)

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:variable name="keyVar" select="//mappings/${key}/text()" /> <xsl:variable name="keyVar2" select="//mappings/${key2}/text()" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <items> <item> <importset-table> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">task_ci</xsl:text> </importset-table> <xsl:element name="{$keyVar}">${value}</xsl:element> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(normalize-space('${key2}'))"> <xsl:element name="{$keyVar2}">$[value 2]</xsl:element> </xsl:when> </xsl:choose> </item> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

input.value: SNOW: Get Relationships - ServiceNow - Relationship mappings>>>>>>>>>>

documentation.description: This workflow will find a relationship for a given set of variables.
